data.fullContent: When I was a kid, I used to get into a lot of trouble because of my habit of leaving the window in my bedroom open during the summer. My mom would be worried about my safety because I would leave it open when it was hot outside, but it did help us save on electricity. Now I am allowing myself to buy an air conditioner. It will probably cost a lot of money to keep it running all the time. However, now that I have a family, it's more important to have a room that is cooler and more comfortable.

q1.translation: 当我还是个孩子的时候，我经常因为在夏天把卧室的窗户开着而惹上很多麻烦。我妈妈会担心我的安全，因为外面很热的时候我会开着门，但这确实帮我们省了电。现在我允许自己买一台空调。
q1.front: When I was a kid, I used to get into a lot of trouble because of my habit of leaving the window in my bedroom open during the summer. My mom would be worried about my safety because I would leave it open when it was hot outside, but it did help us save on electricity. Now I am allowing myself to buy an air conditioner.

options.sentence: It will probably cost a lot of money to keep it running all the time.
I loved this unit so much that I decided to have another one installed in my bedroom.
It's like my house is always occupied, no matter what time of the year it is.
We kept track of how much money we spent on our old AC unit, but it was never enough.

options.sentence: I didn't have an air conditioner as a kid but now I need and can afford one for my family.
Many days I wanted to stay in my house, but I knew that I had to go to work.
If I ever buy a new apartment, I'm going to get one that blows cold air through my windows at night.
A fan can cool off a room very quickly, but it doesn't stay cool for long.
